Class LengthNormalization<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.AbstractStreamFilter
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.AbstractStreamConversionFilter<O,O>

          • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.LengthNormalization<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - vector type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BundleStreamSource, Normalization<V>, ObjectFilter, StreamFilter, InspectionUtilFrequentlyScanned, Parameterizable

    public class LengthNormalization<V extends NumberVector<V,?>>
extends AbstractStreamNormalization<V>
    Class to perform a normalization on vectors to norm 1.
